text: Benito Orgiana (10 February 1938 â€“ 2 April 2021) was an Italian politician. He was born in Orroli, Italy. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1992 until 1994. He was a member of the Italian Republican Party. He was a cofounder of the Fortza Paris party. Orgiana died on 2 April 2021, aged 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Sardinia
title: Benito Orgiana
